tasks.description: Fix 'Unknown column Status' fatal error in index.php
tasks.details: Corrected column names for 'Posts' table queries in index.php (Status -> Published, PublishedAt -> PublishedDate) to match legacy database schema.

tasks.description: Fix SMR Charts database source and display
tasks.details: Resolved database permission issues and empty proxy tables. The SMR Airplay Charts now pull from the 'nextgennoise.radiospins' legacy source, with aggregation logic (SUM(TWS)) and artist mapping to the ngn_2025 profile system. Fixed SQL column casing and variable synchronization in the template.

tasks.description: Fix blank landing pages for Posts, Videos, Releases, and Songs
tasks.details: Stabilized Post and Video singular views. Resolved SQLSTATE[HY093] by using unique named placeholders in video queries. Applied site-wide null-coalescing (??) to all htmlspecialchars() calls in loops (Home, Posts, Entity Lists) to silence PHP 8.1+ deprecation warnings and handle missing metadata gracefully.

Added a comprehensive 'Library' menu overlay for all platform sections. Fixed layout cutting issue by adding a fixed header spacer and increasing bottom padding to 160px to accommodate both player and nav bars.

tasks.description: Implement a robust digital signature system for all platform contracts.
tasks.details: Developed AgreementService, Agreement Viewer partial, and functional Admin tools for document management and real-time signature audit logs. Implemented SHA-256 fingerprinting for document integrity.

tasks.description: Document new systems in the Technical Bible
tasks.details: Added Chapter 41 (Digital Agreements and Signatures) to /docs/bible and updated the Master Index.
